snippet.title: OpenClonk Beyond the Rocks Trailer
snippet.description:
Download available at:
http://www.openclonk.org

Beyond the Rocks is the latest update to our open-source, mod-friendly, pixel-physics platformer. In this release we have added the true heart of the Clonk series: Settlement.

With this release are included a handful of Settlement scenarios, as well as major updates and fixes to existing content. Bear in mind this is a steady work-in-progress which will gain more features and polish as we continue development.
